data.title: LaurelBrooke entrances stay safer and more beautiful in Franklin TN.
data.meta_description: LaurelBrooke in Franklin, Tennessee, is safer and more beautiful at the end of the day with exquisite HOA entrance and exit lighting, and easier to locate, too, with improved signage lighting.
data.text:
Yes, many of us use the GPS function on our iOS or Android phone when driving – especially at night. It’s just one of the benefits and blessings of advancements in telecommunications technology.

How well we remember the day Steve Jobs introduced the iPhone back on January 9, 2007. As he said that day, “Today, Apple is going to reinvent the phone.”

Reinvent it, they did.

Then one year later, they added GPS technology to guide drivers – and pedestrians – to their intended destinations.

But without outdoor lighting, knowing for sure that you actually did reach your destination may have been questionable. Without question, destination neighborhood entrance outdoor lighting reaffirms that the technology locator was right on target.

To Welcome Residents And Guests To LaurelBrooke In Franklin, TN, After Sunset, We Pumped Up The Volume On Their HOA Exterior Lighting

To make the LaurelBrooke more visible as you drive up to the entrance at night, our COLT-Certified outdoor lighting professionals design and installation professionals recently enhanced the illumination palette there.

We added three 11 Watt BB03 outdoor lighting fixtures on the River Birch to ensure that it was fully illuminated from all sides – now you can’t miss it. They now welcome visitors coming from either direction and warmly say farewell to those upon leaving.

How To Perfect Front And Back HOA Neighborhood Outdoor Lighting

We just redid the lighting at the front and back LaurelBrooke entrance by adding two mini flood lights on each side of the monument sign. By installing two lights and crisscrossing their trajectory, they now illuminate the entire sign and make the gold letters more easily readable.

This is significant as illuminating signage with gold lettering can be difficult when untrained sources approach the work at hand. Gold lettering on signs such as this can be hard to read. Diffused light spread coming from side angles can cause the illumination to obstruct visibility and clarity with a glare.

Exemplary Outdoor Lighting Service For Homeowners Associations And Common Areas

To make your neighborhood more welcoming, appealing and easier to find at night, professional landscape and signage lighting is one of the most effective ways to add beauty and value to any property, be it a home, Bed & Breakfast, tourist attraction or an entire neighborhood, such as LaurelBrooke.

Thanks to our successes after decades in business, we’ve worked with countless Homeowners Associations to enhance the curb appeal and safety of residential neighborhoods across the greater Nashville, Tennessee area.

Outdoor lighting is all that we do; and we understand the science and art of it. When it comes to neighborhoods, we excel at adding beauty, functionality, safety, and security to:

• HOA signage of all types and dimensions

• Entryways and gatehouses

• Clubhouses

• Walkways and pathways

• Pools and other common areas

• Pool houses and neighborhood pool surround lighting

• Neighborhood entry landscape lighting

• Neighborhood entry sign lighting

• Community spaces

• Any shared recreational spaces

• Greenways, pathways and trails

• Tennis courts and pickleball courts

But That’s Not All – We Service And Maintain Our HOA Lighting Installations So You Don’t Have To

After we install your lights, our services don’t end there. We are committed to making sure you are always satisfied with your outdoor lighting. We offer our Annual Maintenance Plan (AMP) to ensure your property is always looking it’s best. We provide one year of free maintenance for all of our systems, and then you can purchase our AMP, which will allow us to continually take care of any disrupted fixtures, broken bulbs, or other common issues that you may experience.

Learn More About What We Can Do For Your HOA Outdoor Lighting Needs

As it may be difficult to visualize what your property will look like with our outdoor signage and destination lighting solutions, we offer complimentary custom outdoor lighting design plans.

We’ll tour your property, discuss what you’re looking for, and then make some recommendations. There is no obligation to purchase our services. We simply want to show you what we can do. We’re confident enough you’ll be impressed with what we have to offer.

To schedule it now, call us at 615-697-4629; or click here.
